summary: Winnie the Pooh and company embark on a quest to rescue Christopher Robin from certain doom in a place called "Skull" after misreading a note he left for them.
cast: Jim Cummings|John Fiedler|Ken Sansom|Andre Stojka|Peter Cullen|Brady Bluhm|David Warner|Paul Winchell|Frankie J. Galasso
keywords: winnie the pooh character|piglet character|tigger character|eeyore character|rabbit character
title: La gran aventura de Winnie the Pooh
